column2: "Oh, it hurts having underestimated you! At the very least let me give you some advice! The Vol Dragon uses lava."
"You probably already knew that, but come on! Throw me a bone here. At least pretend you just heard it for the first time!"
"Hey, how about this time, instead of showing me how it's done, you pretend you're avenging my defeat? Ha ha!"
